65 contributorsbleeding love lyricsintro
hey

verse 1

and everyones lookin round thinkin im going crazy
ooh yeah

prechorus
but i dont care what they say im in love with you
they try to pull me away but they dont know the truth
my hearts crippled by the vein that i keep on closin
you cut me open and i

but nothins greater than the rush that comes with your embrace
and in this world of loneliness i see your face
yet everyone around me thinks that im going crazy
maybe maybe
